info: The Dine House is a online based cloud kitchen that provides a wide range of delicious and healthy bengali food options. We are committed to providing our customers with the best possible dining experience.
displayItemDescription: Chicken Khichuri is a popular bengali dish that is made with chicken, rice, and a variety of spices. It is a delicious and healthy dish that is perfect for a meal.
newsletterDescription: Enjoy weekly hand picked recipes and recommendations
